resources.string: Scan a Web Link and open it from the mobile browser
Scan a Phone Number and call it directly
Scan a Business Card and save it in your contacts
Scan a word and Search it on the web
Scan text in any language and Translate it to yours
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
